segments.text: I'd like to reserve a double room . I will be arriving next Monday , the 12th . My name is Wilson .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: A double room for the 12th ? The name is Wilson ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How long will you be staying ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Three or four days , perhaps longer .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Very good , sir . We will be expecting you next Monday , the 12th .
segments.speaker: S1
